Put in cstrike/maps
My second map. This is a short version of the map. Hence the v1. I am going to make a v2. I hope you enjoy it. There are 6 levels and a Bonus room. I hope you enjoy.

Fix includes - more spawn points
             - no glitch on level 5
             - works on online servers

Special thanks to [SG] Paul, Acehigh, Spiral for fix.

*** v2_beta here http://www.mediafire.com/?v5p8334ri2b9291***

This is my third map. My second release. I think this is a massive improvement on my previous map. It has a theme. Good lighting. Some original traps that follow the theme. I also went more for what people wanted rather than what was easy to make. I hope you will enjoy this map. xD

[If you like my maps join my steam group! Means a lot to me! (Clickly)](http://steamcommunity.com/groups/ghosts_group "Clicky")

Basic Info
==========

This is a re-make of an original mg map. http://gamebanana.com/css/maps/153563

I have completely re-made the map for a competition in plaguefest.com

How it works
============

You start in the spawn area. From there there are two randomizing platform which you jump to (,only one platform is active at a time), and then go to the island in the spawn area with portals. These portals give you power-ups and the ability to build the map.

Power Ups
=========

###### Ninja 
Gives you 20% visibility during the game so you can try and sneak around the enemy
###### Roof Sniper
Gives you access to the roof which is perfect for sniping. Also give you 300hp, which is enough to take a few hits. You can drop down a hole to get into the map and play with your 300 hp that way. The sniper roof breaks after a certain amount of time.
###### Wall builder
You are teleported to the start area, on your next spawn you will start on top of the map with an ability to spawn walls under you to build the arena. To build simply look down so you can see where you are placing them and press +attack to spawn walls under you. At the end of the building time you will be teleported back to the spawn and play normally.
###### Floor Builder
You are teleported to the start arena, on your next spawn you will start on top of the map with an m4. With this m4 you can shoot down under you, where your bullet hits a piece of ground will spawn under you. You will start in your spawn building as normal once building timer hits 0.
###### Music DJ
You get teleported to a DJ room with a sophisticated music picking system. There are instructions there so you can easily pick a track. Once you pick a track you will be teleported to the start building.

Secrets
==================
- There is a hidden secret grenade which heals you while you hold it, cannot be combined with other perks.
- The is a hidden song, which I doubt you will find without me showing you or without you decompiling the map

Bugs
==================
- Sometimes people retain the super speed from the builder (count it as a bonus for building)
- Sometimes portal does not de-activate after some-one walks through

A Final Note
============
Show your appreciation of my maps by joining my steam group here!

http://steamcommunity.com/groups/ghosts_group

This helps me know people appreciate my maps and is where I announce new maps! Also this is where I release map I dont upload to GB!

First release of this map.

A failure on each level results in a teleport back to the beginning of that level.

First person to finish gets to kill the opposing team members.

AFKs will be teleported to a special cage, just for them.

Last Update: 07/19/2010
Added: A rules sign in front of the players when they spawn
Texts are now in English.

Dernière Mise à Jour: 15/19/2010
Ajouté: Un panneau d'information sur les règles du jeu devant les joueurs lorsqu'ils apparaissent.
Les messages d'informations sont maintenant exclusivement en anglais.

---------------

French:
Superbe carte pour un serveur fun de type MiniGame. Construisez votre fort à l'aide de votre couteau (Pendant une minute), ramassez une arme (M4a1 ou Ak47) et défendez le coûte que coûte!
Les corniches de la carte sont accessibles depuis une échelle à chaque spawn. Un passage secret ne peut être activé qu'à partir du code de sécurité.

Merci de l'intérêt que vous portez à cette carte.

Cordialement.

English:
This is a beautiful map for a fun server like a MiniGame. Build your own fort with your cut (During a minute), then get a weapon (M4a1 or Ak47) and defend it of your life!
You can access to the ledges by a ladder in every spawn. A secret way can only be activated by a security keypad.

Thanks for your interest.

Best regards.
Thanks for download my new map

This map was made by me and oobis a while back. I just now decided to share it openly. I is a minigame in which the Terrorists spawn in these shooting range areas with a window that can only be seen from their side. They can have either type of sniper rifle. They CT spawn with no weps and must run to the end without getting killed. Once reaching the end they can pick up grenades in which to throw inside the slots of the Terrorist boxes and blow them up. The glass in which the CT can see T on the top is only one sided. So the T has no idea where you are. The map features a helicopter noise in the beginning and has lighting effect. The secret room includes a lobby with a trail grenade, couches, ipads, music booth, and hot tub. The other room includes a Disco room that has a DJ booth, a bar, and a dance floor. There is a secret music button in this map somewhere. Where is it and what is it? You'll just have to find it yourself. This took some good time of work even though some of you out there can probably do way better than me. But hey, I'm new to mapping ok? Enjoy as much as you want

Note: Most fun with 8+ people

Todo List: v2 including grenade fix in which you can get more grenades without having to be far away from it first and glitching.

This is a minigame map that i made and my first minigame map.

Songs used:

-Totally spies theme song 
- Waiting for the world to change
- smosh - firetruck
- DJ Tiesto - Titanic
- Mt eden BHP - when will the storm begin
- Hamster song 
- uknown - hure
- hardstyle2010

Enjoy

If I have not credited you for something you did, please leave a comment below or send me a message saying so.
-------------------------------------------------------------------

Basically you're all stuck in a room on "The Grand Spaceship", and someone hits the "Self Destruct" button (someone has to hit it to leave the room). So your goal is to run to the escape pods before the ship blows up!

Yes, I know its corny, it's suppost to be.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

The theme is space, so I tried making a lot of the obstacles with some sort of aspect of space.

OBSTACLES:

- Jump over moving blocks
- Fan
- Rock jump (low gravity)
- Lasers
- Fan pushing up
- Strafe down
- Outside jumping (only have 15s)
- Doors crush you
- Lasers with moving platform and fan
- Upward Strafe
- Forward Strafe
- Jumping
- Lasers

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Once you beat the end, you will be able to play the Goldeneye theme song or get speed for the next round (Only lasts one round).

-------------------------------------------------------------------

**FIXES FOR V2**

- Fix lasers cheat/glitch
- Add more to the end
- Fix spawn killer
- Add more secret nades
- Smooth out some traps
- Make song only play for one round
- Fix old gravity glitch from "!restart"
- Fix the nodraw on the sign in spawn

Add to your cstrike/maps folder

After much testing...this is the final version to my map.

Final version is bug-free.

The map is extended and now longer.

Changed the lighting to make it more of a visible map.

There are now 5 ways to kill the T if you win the race. Including 3 secret buttons.

4 Hidden flash bangs to be used by the CT's for defense against the T using the cannon.


The object is for the CT's to complete the course without getting blasted by the cannon which is controlled by the T's.

There are many different obstacles for the CT's to overcome. The cannon shoots every .75 seconds which allows the CT's to time the cannons shots will hiding behind the various structures.

Here is a video of the map. Please check it out!

[Check out the video of my map!](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cF9Mq94zU-c "mg_g2_RUN_finalvirgin")

UPDATE***

Sorry the last map I uploaded had problems with the CT Spawns not working. So I've uploaded Version 2.

New version has a hidden smoke grenade as well as a bigger CT spawn.

Map Created by Chaddcl0ps (G)^2

Steamdid cl0pzilla

Add to your cstrike/maps folder


ENJOY!


This is the second version to my previous map release mg_smash_GamerSquared.

The difference is that the platforms don't fall.

The object is for the CT's to complete the course without getting blasted by the cannon which is controlled by the T's.

There are many different obstacles for the CT's to overcome. The cannon shoots every .75 seconds which allows the CT's to time the cannons shots will hiding behind the various structures.

Hope you enjoy and add it to your public servers!

Recommended on NoBlock servers

Install into  C/steam/steamapps/username/counterstrikesource/cstrike/maps

I'm relatively new to map making. This is my 4th map release. I hope everyone has enjoyed my previous maps.

This is a beta version, there are a few things that sometimes don't work and I can't figure out why(sometimes fall dmg doesn't work but it works for others/ When people throw nades it echos throughout the whole map(disable this by using "sv_ignoregrenaderadio 1")). . But the whole course is completable and finished.

You don't die in this map, so no restarting at the beginning. 

Map is complete with -
Obstacles
Climbing
Sliderace
Launch Ramps
And much more!

*(may need to turn your sound up on level 11)

Remember to add these commands to console
("sv_ airaccelerate 100")
("sv_ ignoregrenaderadio 1")

Any feedback or bugs reported will be appreciated. Enjoy.

[Download Now! - mg_ g2_ course](http://adf.ly/2KFdQ)

This map can be used for minigame servers and also for fight yard servers.
You play on two sides, which are shielded from each other by a wall.
In the wall there are small holes where you can swim in.
After 30 seconds the water level decreases and the bulkhead rises.
On the bottom of the map there is built a small complex where the Ts and CTs can fight further if they are still not dead. Have fun.

mg_fy_messerschlucht_v1_00 is a map developed for minigame and fight yard servers. In this map you have to jump down and at the end to survive. If other players from the enemy team are also survived you have to make a knife fight until the last player has survived. Its very funny because its not sure that you come anyway to the floor. There are many obstrucktions where you can die. Have fun.

Copyright by Gregor/Betrunkener/Eiskalter Ninja

This map can be used for minigame servers and also for fight yard servers.
There is a large room, divided into two segments each.
They are a lot of floors and a buy zone included. There is also a secret room :)

Have fun

Today, i'm going to show you my new map, mg_fun_omahabeach. Map 64 slots and very realistic.

This map represent the war 39-45 by the landing of Normandy. 

The CTs starts on a aircraft carrier and have to take the boat or the helicopters to land on the beach and kill all the terrorists.

The Terrorists starts in bunkers and have to take the machine gun or stay with there mp5Navy to kill all the Counter-Terrorists.

If you arrive with the helicopter, just push in the blue blocs to activate the dynamite.

N!kO

Visit : www.niko-mapping-studio.tk

NEW VERSION (08/29/2010) It's the new version of mg_fun_multimods_2010 with 2 levels add (item_battle and race). I fixed some bugs too. Good Luck and ENJOY !

Hello guys ! (sorry for my bad english)

I made this map (352 hours of work). It's an allinone map with 7 levels, a nice design,
a gameplay of dream, an original spawn and chooselevel, and a lot of other things... There are a lot of details too 
(for example the town on start). This map work with 64 players. Map optimized with some sounds like mg_fun_multigames (i made it ^^).
So, the levels are : 

***************
SURF
***************

THEME : Metal Area
GAMEPLAY : Easy surf ramps
DETAILS : Nice level with a jail (usp if fall in) and some ramps (if finished you can have a deagle with an awp).

***************
ITEM_BATTLE
***************

THEME : Forest 
GAMEPLAY : Enjoy !
DETAILS : There are 6 different item :
- Sex toy laser with splash
- Horse with a sword
- Jet-Pack
- A tree
- Paddle to activate spikes
- Monitor to explode your enemies

***************
TETRIS
***************

THEME : Tetris textures 
GAMEPLAY : Agility recommended
DETAILS : In this level, you have to avoid the blocs who fall in the sky. Move your body !

***************
BASIC
***************

THEME : Snowbase
GAMEPLAY : Like in an AIM
DETAILS : This level have a buyzone and a lot of other things...

***************
SLIDERACE
***************

THEME : Metal Area 
GAMEPLAY : A little bit hard
DETAILS : You are pushed forward and you have to avoid the obstacle

***************
CAR_RACE
***************

THEME : Race Stadium
GAMEPLAY : Funny and original
DETAILS : You have to drive your lamborghini and reach the finish the first ! After that, run for your deagle !

***************
CLIMB
***************

THEME : Forest
GAMEPLAY : A little bit hard
DETAILS : You have to climb before the flood !

I used custom textures and models.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Visit :
http://www.niko-mapping-studio.tk

(=^^=)

**Be aware:** Changes in this version are minimal and it has mainly been released as an attempt at fixing the team switcher in time for Halloween. The map will receive a lot more updates, and potentially even a CS:GO port some time soon. If you have good ideas for improvements PLEASE message me either on here, or YouTube (which I check almost every day) http://www.youtube.com/SpyWhoLovedHimself I **WILL** take your suggestions very seriously. Those who have criticism, definitely message me with ways I can make it more enjoyable for you, I want to make this map fun for everyone.


Quick Message
=====================

Crazy to think I first released this map Halloween of 2009 (3 whole years ago) and have been further developing it on and off ever since! Thank you to those who have supported me and this map throughout! I know it's a bit like Marmite, some will love it, whilst some don't enjoy Hide & Seek (I am always trying to improve the gameplay to make it more fun for those players, hence the CT knife). But to everyone who has messaged me to tell me how much they love the map, thank you... That's what makes it all worth it to me! I take all suggestions very seriously, without user input it wouldn't be where it is now... Again, thanks.

- Starving Hobo

P.S. If you have a few friends with mic, try playing this map at night in a small private server. Alltalk on. I personally think it's the most fun played that way :)


Fright Night: Part 2 (Fix: V3)
=====================

About the map:

It functions as a hide and seek map with a few twists.  Counter-Terrorists spawn with no weapons and must hide and avoid being killed by the Terrorists who must hunt them down and kill them.  There is a three minute time limit, after which the Terrorists will be killed and swapped with Counter-Terrorists.  There is a maximum of three Terrorists who play as Leatherface, Jack Torrance and Freddy Krueger, each gets a special weapon apart from Freddy, but Freddy can play scary music by right clicking after a certain amount of time has passed.  It is set up to be like a horror movie with some areas being based on movie scenes, such as the kitchen (The Texas Chainsaw Massacre), bathroom (The Shining), tool shed (The Evil Dead), maze (The Shining) and the "bookshelf" door (horror cliché).

There is a single knife which spawns in the tool shed after a random amount of time each round.  When a Counter-Terrorist picks it up he assumes the character of Ash (The Evil Dead) with matching quotes on right click.


Terrorists: 3
Counter-Terrorists: 29

Maximum of 32 players.


NO-BLOCK SERVER PLUGIN VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR PLAYING THIS MAP


Changelog
=====================


Changelog [CURRENT VERSION] (mg_frightnight_final_v3):

- REDRUM added to bathroom door
- Title screen music fixed
- Team switcher altered as the old one did not work


Changelog [CURRENT VERSION] (mg frightnight final v2):

- Team switcher, switches Terrorists with surviving Counter-Terrorists if Terrorists lose
- Added new tool shed
- Added a knife which spawns in the tool shed
- Added Evil Dead quotes (Ash) for the CT knife
- New exit from the mansion in the bookshelf secret compartment, locked if there is only one Terrorist
- New Jack Torrance quote when trying to open a locked bathroom door as Jack
- Leatherface screams and cries like in the movies
- Fixed ghost, new scarier model
- 3 ghostly experiences to find
- Alternate Freddy music (there are now two tracks)
- New intro view, very horror movie-esque title credit roll
- Various added detail including a head in a saucepan in the kitchen
- Attic extended again with a secret compartment at the back
- Attic lighting dimmed
- Counter-Terrorists can't get a Terrorist weapon anymore
- Fixed bug where a Terrorist could use a flashlight
- Fixed attic window glitch
- Added 3D skybox (credit thegregster101)
- Altered fog settings
- Secrets more user friendly (e.g. door lock pulsates before use to make it more obvious)
- New skybox texture (credit Hip Shot)
- "Cheap" hiding spot in the maze lit
- "Cheap" hiding spot in the gallery lit
- "Here's Johnny!" quote can only be used once every 30 seconds now (used to be 10)
- Axe now also swings on right click
- Axe can't be spammed anymore
- TV may or may not come on at random intervals instead of always turning on every 100 seconds
- Small cubemap fixes
- Added more hiding places in attic


Changelog 2010 (mg frightnight final):

- Added cellar with trap door into maze
- Scream sound effect when the first Counter-Terrorist is murdered.
- Soundscapes to make the rain quieter inside
- Window models added on the back of the house
- Attic smaller and lit
- Bathroom door can be knifed anywhere to break it down in sequence
- Round time shortened to 3 minutes to cut down waiting time for dead players


Changelog 2009 (mg frightnight beta2):

- Quotes for all terrorist players by right clicking
- Terrorists have a chainsaw, axe, and knife (no glove model for Freddy exists)
- Living room TV plays the video from The Ring, and illuminates the room
- Awesome thunder weather effects
- Closet on the second floor of the mansion you can hide in
- Flashlights disabled


Map Story
=====================

It's 3 minutes to midnight on Halloween! A group of CTs have seeked refuge from the storm in an old haunted mansion. Just when everything seemed okay, a huge lightning bolt struck three graves outside of the mansion! Shocked, the CTs watched outside, as three killers rose from their graves wielding scary looking weapons! The CTs desperately searched for their own weapons but remembered that they had lost them a long way back! The murderers have just 3 minutes until Halloween ends and they must return to their graves for another year, but can the CTs survive for that long as they are chased and taunted in the dark scary mansion?!


Ghost Hunting Side Quest
=====================

There are 3 ghost sightings hidden in this map. The ghost is of the caretaker (you can find his hanging corpse in the tool shed basement). If you want a little ghost hunting fun see if you can find them all. One of the sightings is only enabled on certain rounds randomly (1/6 chance).

Video Showing Secrets & Lesser Known Gameplay Features
=====================

**Warning: Ghost hunt spoilers.**

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YSC7Mb1-g3Y
	<iframe width="420" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/YSC7Mb1-g3Y" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Trivia (A.K.A. sh*t nobody cares about)
=====================

- The map was originally going to be a spooky version of item battle until during play-testing, one of the players without a weapon commented that it was really scary being chased without any way to defend himself.
- The attic of the original map prior to release was the full length of the room and completely pitch black, terrorists would run around using radar to find any CTs hiding up there.
- Before the gameplay was changed from item battle, the crypt outside was going to be an entrance to a ghost train which would take players around the map and through the mansion.
- The TV works by using a series of doors, a logic_timer and a LOT of hard work syncing it with the original video (it used to have audio)... The title screen works the same way.

Fright Night: Part 2
=====================

About the map:

It functions as a hide and seek map with a few twists.  Counter-Terrorists spawn with no weapons and must hide and avoid being killed by the Terrorists who must hunt them down and kill them.  There is a three minute time limit, after which the Terrorists will be killed and swapped with Counter-Terrorists.  There is a maximum of three Terrorists who play as Leatherface, Jack Torrance and Freddy Krueger, each gets a special weapon apart from Freddy, but Freddy can play scary music by right clicking after a certain amount of time has passed.  It is set up to be like a horror movie with some areas being based on movie scenes, such as the kitchen (The Texas Chainsaw Massacre), bathroom (The Shining), tool shed (The Evil Dead), maze (The Shining) and the "bookshelf" door (horror cliché).

There is a single knife which spawns in the tool shed after a random amount of time each round.  When a Counter-Terrorist picks it up he assumes the character of Ash (The Evil Dead) with matching quotes on right click.


Terrorists: 3
Counter-Terrorists: 29

Maximum of 32 players.


NO-BLOCK SERVER PLUGIN VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR PLAYING THIS MAP


Changelog
=====================


Changelog [CURRENT VERSION] (mg frightnight final v2):

- Team switcher, switches Terrorists with surviving Counter-Terrorists if Terrorists lose
- Added new tool shed
- Added a knife which spawns in the tool shed
- Added Evil Dead quotes (Ash) for the CT knife
- New exit from the mansion in the bookshelf secret compartment, locked if there is only one Terrorist
- New Jack Torrance quote when trying to open a locked bathroom door as Jack
- Leatherface screams and cries like in the movies
- Fixed ghost, new scarier model
- 3 ghostly experiences to find
- Alternate Freddy music (there are now two tracks)
- New intro view, very horror movie-esque title credit roll
- Various added detail including a head in a saucepan in the kitchen
- Attic extended again with a secret compartment at the back
- Attic lighting dimmed
- Counter-Terrorists can't get a Terrorist weapon anymore
- Fixed bug where a Terrorist could use a flashlight
- Fixed attic window glitch
- Added 3D skybox (credit thegregster101)
- Altered fog settings
- Secrets more user friendly (e.g. door lock pulsates before use to make it more obvious)
- New skybox texture (credit Hip Shot)
- "Cheap" hiding spot in the maze lit
- "Cheap" hiding spot in the gallery lit
- "Here's Johnny!" quote can only be used once every 30 seconds now (used to be 10)
- Axe now also swings on right click
- Axe can't be spammed anymore
- TV may or may not come on at random intervals instead of always turning on every 100 seconds
- Small cubemap fixes
- Added more hiding places in attic


Changelog 2010 (mg frightnight final):

- Added cellar with trap door into maze
- Scream sound effect when the first Counter-Terrorist is murdered.
- Soundscapes to make the rain quieter inside
- Window models added on the back of the house
- Attic smaller and lit
- Bathroom door can be knifed anywhere to break it down in sequence
- Round time shortened to 3 minutes to cut down waiting time for dead players


Changelog 2009 (mg frightnight beta2):

- Quotes for all terrorist players by right clicking
- Terrorists have a chainsaw, axe, and knife (no glove model for Freddy exists)
- Living room TV plays the video from The Ring, and illuminates the room
- Awesome thunder weather effects
- Closet on the second floor of the mansion you can hide in
- Flashlights disabled


Map Story
=====================

It's 3 minutes to midnight on Halloween! A group of CTs have seeked refuge from the storm in an old haunted mansion. Just when everything seemed okay, a huge lightning bolt struck three graves outside of the mansion! Shocked, the CTs watched outside, as three killers rose from their graves wielding scary looking weapons! The CTs desperately searched for their own weapons but remembered that they had lost them a long way back! The murderers have just 3 minutes until Halloween ends and they must return to their graves for another year, but can the CTs survive for that long as they are chased and taunted in the dark scary mansion?!


Ghost Hunting Side Quest
=====================

There are 3 ghost sightings hidden in this map. The ghost is of the caretaker (you can find his hanging corpse in the tool shed basement). If you want a little ghost hunting fun see if you can find them all. One of the sightings is only enabled on certain rounds randomly (1/6 chance).

Video Showing Secrets & Lesser Known Gameplay Features
=====================

**Warning: Ghost hunt spoilers.**

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YSC7Mb1-g3Y
	<iframe width="420" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/YSC7Mb1-g3Y" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Special Thanks:

. Louie (design help & assistance, and for hosting the first beta map publicly)
. Welshdude (for making my banner)



"It is 3 minutes to midnight on Haloween! A group of CTs have seeked refuge from the storm in an old haunted mansion. Just when everything seemed okay, a huge lightning bolt struck three graves outside of the mansion! Shocked, the CTs watched outside, as three killers rose from their graves wielding scary looking weapons! The CTs desperately searched for their own weapons but remembered that they had lost them a long way back! The murderers have just 4 minutes until Haloween ends and they must return to their graves for another year, but can the CTs survive for that long as they are chased and taunted in the dark scary mansion?!"



mg_frightnight_final

First BETA played publicly on Halloween 2009 on Warmcup minigame server.




Best played:

. With friends
. With mic
. With alltalk on (sv_alltalk 1)

It's nowhere near as good when nobody uses mic. It's best when everyone is creeping each other out and getting jumpy.




Objective:

Counter-Terrorists have no weapons and must survive for 3 minutes by hiding and running from the three Terrorists who play as famous movie killers, Freddy Krueger (the knife), Leatherface (the chainsaw) and Jack Torrance (the axe).




Notes:

. The bathroom door can be locked with a bolt on the inside of the door. When it is locked, the Terrorists can only get in by breaking one pane of the door which mirrors a scene from The Shining.

. By right clicking as a Terrorist, the players who are Freddy Krueger and Jack Torrance can shout movie quotes. Freddy does an evil laugh taken from the school scene in the original Nightmare On Elm Street, and Jack Torrance shouts "Here's Johnny!" Which is a famous quote from the bathroom scene of The Shining. After a certain time period, right clicking as Freddy will play tense chase music from the original Nightmare On Elm Street movie. Leatherface doesn't have a special quote or function, but the chainsaw is always buzzing which scares Counter-Terrorists as it gets closer!

. There is a closet on the second floor which can be opened and Counter-Terrorists can hide inside if they are feeling brave!

. The living room is in pitch black and is a good hiding spot until the TV comes on. The TV plays the video seen in The Ring, and illuminates the room.

. Other similar events can light up rooms and make Counter-Terrorists easy to spot, for example, upstairs there are two windows from which the room is illuminated from when the lightning strikes.

. Flashlights are disabled by default. Terrorists search by standing far back to see players in the fog, or by hovering their crosshair over the darkness in suspect locations until names appear.

. When playing Counter-Terrorist, it is best to choose to be the SAS otherwise your visor may be visible in the darkness!

. The resident ghost lives in the attic!



NEW:

. There is now a cellar.

. By going in the cupboard in the cellar, you can go through a secret tunnel and through a trap door in the maze.

. Time limit shortened to cut down long waiting times when dead.

. A scream is heard when the first CT is murdered.

. Soundscapes added which make the rain quieter inside.

. Secret hiding location by opening a bookcase which is really a door in the first floor library.

. Window models added on the back of the house to improve looks.

. The door can now be knifed anywhere and the pane will break down in sequence.

. Attic is smaller with a small light on one side.



Have fun!
Starving Hobo


If there are any errors, problems, or you have any suggestions for the next release, please contact me by sending me a PM on my YouTube account, http://www.youtube.com/spywholovedhimself/ as I check it regularly. Thanks! :)

Special Thanks:

. Louie (design help & assistance, and for hosting the first beta map publicly)
. Welshdude (for making my banner)

Best played:

It's nowhere near as good when nobody uses mic.  It's best when everyone is creeping each other out and getting jumpy.




Objective:

Counter-Terrorists have no weapons and must survive for 4 minutes by hiding and running from the three Terrorists who play as famous movie killers, Freddy Krueger (the knife), Leatherface (the chainsaw) and Jack Torrance (the axe).




Notes:

. The bathroom door can be locked with a bolt on the inside of the door.  When it is locked, the Terrorists can only get in by breaking one pane of the door which mirrors a scene from The Shining.

. By right clicking as a Terrorist, the players who are Freddy Krueger and Jack Torrance can shout movie quotes.  Freddy does an evil laugh taken from the school scene in the original Nightmare On Elm Street, and Jack Torrance shouts "Here's Johnny!"  Which is a famous quote from the bathroom scene of The Shining.  After a certain time period, right clicking as Freddy will play tense chase music from the original Nightmare On Elm Street movie.  Leatherface doesn't have a special quote or function, but the chainsaw is always buzzing which scares Counter-Terrorists as it gets closer!

. There is a closet on the second floor which can be opened and Counter-Terrorists can hide inside if they are feeling brave!

. The living room is in pitch black and is a good hiding spot until the TV comes on.  The TV plays the video seen in The Ring, and illuminates the room.

. Other similar events can light up rooms and make Counter-Terrorists easy to spot, for example, upstairs there are two windows which the room is illuminated from when the lightning strikes.

. Flashlights are disabled by default.  Terrorists search by standing far back to see players in the fog, or by hovering their crosshair over the darkness in suspect locations until names appear.

. When playing Counter-Terrorist, the GSG-9 is a bad class to pick as the visor is usually visible even in the darkness, but players who are brave can pick this class!

. The resident ghost lives in the attic!



Have fun!
Starving Hobo

mg forge galaxies
=================


Objective:
----------

Build your team's fort! Work together to make the best layout possible. Then, eliminate the enemy! With a whole new world every round, gameplay will be different each time. The possibilities are endless!



Build your world:
-----------------

Ten players will be selected to build the level, 5 per team. Four players will build fortifications on two different levels, four will build floors, one will choose game settings, and one will select music. Those who are not building can watch their team's progress. After the level is built, everyone will be teleported to the freshly constructed arena!


Different game modes and settings:
----------------------------------

One player will get two choose any of the following two options every round:

- It's Raining Men mode. Fall from the sky right on top of your enemy!

- Swap sides. Let's hope the base you built isn't that great, because it now belongs to your opponent!

- Temporary fog. For 30 seconds, you will hardly be able to see your hands in front of your face!

- Defend the base mode. Stop the enemy from reaching your base!

- Low gravity. Jump over any obstacle and glide across space!

- +HP. Everyone is now a 250 HP juggernaut!

- Side cover. Tired of snipers watching the flanks? Fear not!


Music to kill (or dance) to:
----------------------------

One player will get to select their favorite tune each round:

- Radiohead: Jigsaw Falling Into Place

- The Beatles: Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds

- The Who: My Generation

- Skyrim OST: Dragonborn

- The Black Keys: 10 A.M. Automatic

- Red Hot Chili Peppers: Scar Tissue

- Sean Paul: Temperature

- Portal 2 OST: Machiavellian Bach

- Queen: Another One Bites the Dust

- Guns N' Roses: Welcome to the Jungle

- Wailing Souls: Fire House Rock

- The White Stripes: Icky Thump


### NoBlock is required for this map.

I've been working on this map from time to time. Thought I'd release it now, or I'd probably never finish it. :) It's a multigame map consisting of 10 different games:

- AWP

- Smoke

- Knife

- Bhop

- Iceskate

- Slide

- Race

- Climb (I'll probably alter this one, none of my friends managed to finish it)

- Tetris

- Buy

I'd say the skill level is probably somewhat higher on this map compared to the most played multigame maps. I've tried to design the maps with the philosophy of "hard, but not impossible". Not really happy with the end result, but, oh well. I hope some will like it. If there's any acute bugs that need fixing, give a shout in the comments. I'll probably make a new version some other time, adding a few more maps.
